evidence_in_dialogue: [[Catherine]] now ... the body position is inconsistent with her lividity
[[Grissom]] dead men do n't ride roller coasters
[[Grissom]] possibly killed by that wrench and stuffed in his own trunk
[[Zack_Lawrence]] the same key that opens up the men 's room door opens up all the power boxes at the park
[[Warrick]] the tip of the shovel glows with the presence of blood
[[Warrick]] couple of months back, they were hired by the victim's mother
[[Raina_Press]] she was trying to steal him from me
[[Zack_Lawrence]] guess i just did n't think about it
